meta.job_title: Financial Analyst II- Sales Compensation Analyst

duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all aspects of the sales compensation cycle including planning, administration, budgeting/forecasting, reporting, and analysis.
Maintain and update the SAP Callidus platform for plans, quotas, and organizational changes.
Collaborate with external consultants on system design updates, testing, and deployment.
Develop actionable metrics and dashboards to showcase the overall compensation plan effectiveness.
Present insightful summaries to senior management that highlight key opportunities and areas of concern.
Participate in cross-functional teams to continually monitor and evaluate business processes and develop strategies for operational excellence.
Provide analytical support on ad hoc projects and data requests working with various internal stakeholders.

education_certification.credential: B.S/M.S. in Finance, Mathematics, Management, or similar disciplines
Experience in a Telecommunications or SaaS Company is a plus
Proficiency with Visualization tools like Tableau and Microsoft BI is a plus
Experience with SQL and data mining tools is a plus
